summary: Extended /todo command with Changelog integration (Step 5.8) and Task Suggestion generation (Step 7.5). Changelog auto-updates ROAD_MAP.md when archiving completed tasks. Task suggestions analyze active tasks, ROADMAP Ambitions/Strategies, and recent completions to propose 3-5 next actions.

artifacts.summary: Added Steps 5.8 (Changelog update) and 7.5 (Task suggestions) with full edge case handling

completion_data.completion_summary: Extended /todo command with Changelog integration and Task Suggestion generation. Added Step 5.8 for automatic ROAD_MAP.md Changelog updates when archiving completed tasks, and Step 7.5 for generating 3-5 actionable task suggestions based on active tasks, ROADMAP Ambitions/Strategies, and recent completions.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Added Steps 5.8 and 7.5 to todo.md, updated dry-run output, git commit patterns, final output sections, and Notes documentation for both features

next_steps: Review implementation and test with /todo --dry-run to verify output
